sect1.title: Introduction
sect1.para: The program searches synonyms (and related words) in a set of texts of special structure (like Wikipedia and other wiki-resources).

listitem.para: Local installation of Wikipedia. It requires MySQL, Apache, MediaWiki, and files with Wikipedia data (see more at www !!!todo!!!).
Jave Runtime Environment (JRE) with version number of at least 1.3.0 You can get the latest JRE from http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/download.jsp

para.emphasis: Удачливый установит систему с первой попытки, внимательный со второй... Настырный установит.

listitem.para: Install Apache, MySQL & PHP. See Linux, Apache, MySQL & PHP (LAMP) Setup Guide, or here, or here. There are the guide for Windows users and one more guide.
Install MediaWiki. Read Hacking MediaWiki (getting started).
Download Wikipedia dumps from Wikimedia Foundation project:

sect1.title: Troubleshooting
sect1.para: The problems which I have encoutered during installation of Wikipedia and some hints to speed-up the program are listed here.

listitem.para: Russian Wikipedia datafiles don't treated properly by "MediaWiki 1.5 alpha 1". Successful versions are: MediaWiki 1.4.0 or 1.4.7.
Russian table (20050309_cur_table.sql) presented in UTF-8. Set browser to UTF-8 (e.g. in Mozilla Firefox: View -> Character Encoding -> More Encodings -> Unicode -> Unicode (UTF-8))
Use settings from /usr/share/mysql/my-innodb-heavy-4G.cnf to speed-up MySQL
